What crops is this useful for?: This product is exclusively for tobacco use.
First aid information?: If in eyes, rinse slowly and gently with water for 12-20 minutes. If on skin or clothing, rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes. If swallowed, have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow. If inhaled, move person to fresh air.
What special restrictions are placed on: Do not apply directly to water, to areas where surface water is present or to intertidal areas below the mean high water mark. Do not apply this product through any type of irrigation system. Do not contaminate water when disposing of equipment washwaters or rinsate.
What PPE should I wear?: Wear long-sleeved shirt and long pants, socks, and shoes, and chemical resistant gloves made of any waterproof material.
How, where, and on what crop should I us: FAIR 30 is a tailor-made formulation exclusively for tobacco use. It should be applied at the correct time, in the correct amounts, and in equal amounts to each plant, in order to obtain the optimum sucker control. Only the upper 1/3 to 1/2 of the plant needs to be sprayed for best results.
How does the product have to be stored o: Store original containers in cool dry place away from food, water and feed. Pesticide wastes resulting from the use of this product may be disposed of on site or at an approved waste disposal facility.
